attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Comments on the e-petitions process should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
Petitions such as the Jeremy Clarkson (humorous) and Chindamo (individual legal case) are no longer accepted. You will note that these are old petitions created some time ago before we tightened our acceptance criteria.
All matters relating to individual legal cases should be taken up directly with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
